settings.desc:
The Next Leap in Travel Boosters
We've been keeping kids safely boosted since 2009 with our trusty BubbleBum-and now, we're proud to introduce TelePort, the newest addition to our family of smart, travel-friendly booster seats.

TelePort was designed with the latest European safety standards FMVSS213B Saftey Standards in mind, and it brings something new to the table: a clever telescopic design that slides into itself, tucks away neatly, and travels like a dream. Instead of inflating, it folds down into a compact shape and packs up in its own cozy foam cover-that doubles as the carry case.
We are a small family business based in the north of Ireland and we appreciate your custom. If you could be so kind as to leave a review we would love to enter you into our competition

NHTSA recommends that children ride in a forward-facing car seat until the child reaches the height or weight limit set by the manufacturer.For the latest information, please visit:https://www.nhtsa.gov/vehicle-safety/car-seats-and-booster-seats
